name: 筆譯研究方法專論
description: This course aims to investigate the issues that translation studies is concerned. It is predominantly theoretical, though examples from actual translation practice will be used.
goals: To investigate the issues that translation studies is concerned.
syllabus:
(Tentative schedule)

\# 1     Introduction; an overview of the seminar

\# 2     Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Intro. & Ch.1;

           高詣軒: 翻譯日本虛擬歌手：「鏡音樂坊」的粉絲字幕實踐

\# 3      Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 2;

           陳繪茹：[戲仿效果的翻譯─以英國喜劇《脫線一籮筐》為例](http://etds.lib.ntnu.edu.tw/cgi-bin/gs/ntnugsweb.cgi?ccd=q09JM2&o=sid=%22GN0694250104%22.&v=-1)

**Due: one-paragraph fuzzy idea for your research topic** 

\# 4     Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 3 & 4;

          林侑青：黑眼珠看藍眼睛  **Due: database search**

\# 5     Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 5;

          林卓君：[西方舌尖上的食色中國—析論《金瓶梅》兩譯者飲食翻譯策略](http://etds.lib.ntnu.edu.tw/cgi-bin/gs/ntnugsweb.cgi?ccd=q09JM2&o=sid=%22GN0699250109%22.&v=-1)

\# 6     Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 6 & 7;

          黃美馨:[《使女的故事》從小說到影集的改編](http://etds.lib.ntnu.edu.tw/cgi-bin/gs32/gsweb.cgi/ccd=RjLAcM/record?r1=33&h1=0)

**Due: Preliminary project title and a general research question/hypothesis with sub-questions**

\# 7       Reading: Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 8, 9 & 10;

           王方：[翻譯「原始」：再現《露西》與 《出神入化2》的亞洲城市](http://etds.lib.ntnu.edu.tw/cgi-bin/gs32/gsweb.cgi/ccd=RjLAcM/record?r1=3&h1=0)

\# 8     劉素勲：浪漫愛的譯與易:1960年以後的現代英美羅曼史翻譯研究

**Due: A well-defined, operational research hypothesis and a proposed research plan with bibliography**

#9     \*Discussions of Proposals

#10     Reading: Wang, Der-wei, “Translating Taiwan: A Study of Four English Anthologies of

Taiwan Fiction;” & Lawrence Venuti, “Translation Studies and World Literature"

#11     Reading: J. Hillis Miller, “Border Crossings, Translating Ruth”; Edward Said, Traveling Theory”

#12    Reading: David Katan, “Translation at the cross-roads: Time for the transcreational

turn?”; Christine Breyel & Thierry Grass, “Machine translation and “biotranslation”: an

unlikely marriag”

#13    Reading: Lucas Klein, “Strong and Weak Interpretations in Translating Chinese Poetry”

#14     Reading: Heekyoung Cho, _Translation’s Forgotten History_

#15     Reading: 張明敏。《村上春樹文學在台灣翻譯與文化》

#16     Reading: Michael Gibbs Hill, _Lin Shu, Inc.: Translation and the Making of Modern Chinese Culture_

methodologies.note: 同學報告，課堂師生討論。
運用部落格及網頁協助教學。

grading.note: 課堂上的實際討論對話。
每週課前回應及個別口頭報告。
